Typealiases.html#/s:14KlarnaPayments0A13.name: KlarnaPaymentAction
Typealiases.html#/s:14KlarnaPayments0A13.abstract: PaymentAction is just a a type-alias to a String describing the action that is being performed.

Typealiases.html#/s:14KlarnaPayments0A21.name: KlarnaPaymentMethodCategory
Typealiases.html#/s:14KlarnaPayments0A21.abstract: PaymentMethodCategory is just a a type-alias to a String describing a payment method category.

Protocols/KlarnaPaymentViewDelegate.html.name: klarnaPaymentViewInitialized(_:)
Protocols/KlarnaPaymentViewDelegate.html.abstract: Klarna payment view has been successfully initialized

Protocols/KlarnaPaymentViewDelegate.html.name: klarnaPaymentViewLoaded(_:)
Protocols/KlarnaPaymentViewDelegate.html.abstract: The specific payment category view has been loaded a second (or nth) time.

Protocols/KlarnaPaymentViewDelegate.html.name: klarnaPaymentView(_:approved:authorizedWithToken:finalizeRequired:)
Protocols/KlarnaPaymentViewDelegate.html.abstract: The specific payment category for the view has been authorized.

Protocols/KlarnaPaymentViewDelegate.html.name: klarnaPaymentView(_:approved:reauthorizedWithToken:)
Protocols/KlarnaPaymentViewDelegate.html.abstract: The specific payment category for the view has been reauthorized.

Protocols/KlarnaPaymentViewDelegate.html.name: klarnaPaymentView(_:approved:finalizedWithToken:)
Protocols/KlarnaPaymentViewDelegate.html.abstract: The specific payment category for the view has been finalized and the merchant can use the token to complete the order.

Protocols/KlarnaPaymentViewDelegate.html.name: klarnaPaymentView(_:resizedToHeight:)
Protocols/KlarnaPaymentViewDelegate.html.abstract: Klarna payment view has been resized to a new height.

Protocols/KlarnaPaymentViewDelegate.html.name: klarnaPaymentView(_:failedWithError:)
Protocols/KlarnaPaymentViewDelegate.html.abstract: Called when a Klarna payment error occurred in any steps.

Classes/KlarnaPaymentView.html#/s:14Klar.name: category
Classes/KlarnaPaymentView.html#/s:14Klar.abstract: Category of payment method loaded in this view.

Classes/KlarnaPaymentView.html#/s:14Klar.name: isAvailable
Classes/KlarnaPaymentView.html#/s:14Klar.abstract: Informs whether this PaymentView should be presented to the customer.

Classes/KlarnaPaymentView.html#/s:14Klar.name: isLoaded
Classes/KlarnaPaymentView.html#/s:14Klar.abstract: Informs whether this PaymentView’s content is loaded.

Classes/KlarnaPaymentView.html#/c:@M@Kla.name: init(coder:)
Classes/KlarnaPaymentView.html#/c:@M@Kla.abstract: Klarna payment view does not support initialization from storyboard or xib files.

Classes/KlarnaPaymentView.html#/s:14Klar.name: load(jsonData:)
Classes/KlarnaPaymentView.html#/s:14Klar.abstract: Performs a pre-assessment for this payment method category.

Classes/KlarnaPaymentsError.html#/s:14Kl.name: isFatal
Classes/KlarnaPaymentsError.html#/s:14Kl.abstract: Informs whether this error is fatal. If an error is fatal, the payment view should not be shown any further.

Classes/KlarnaPaymentsError.html#/s:14Kl.name: action
Classes/KlarnaPaymentsError.html#/s:14Kl.abstract: Optional name of the payment action which caused the error

Classes/KlarnaPaymentsError.html#/s:14Kl.name: invalidFields
Classes/KlarnaPaymentsError.html#/s:14Kl.abstract: If this error is non-fatal, it may contain a list of invalid fields in the order that the merchant must correct to get an approved order.

Classes/KlarnaPaymentsError.html.name: KlarnaPaymentsError
Classes/KlarnaPaymentsError.html.abstract: A KlarnaPaymentError describes an error that occurred during any of the stages within the SDK.

Classes/KlarnaPaymentView.html.name: KlarnaPaymentView
Classes/KlarnaPaymentView.html.abstract: A UIView rendering a payment method category.
